channel.title: Map Reduce :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script One of the last things I want to talk about here with big data is some of the algorithms that we can actually use to work with this sheer amount of information. So one that I want to highlight here is called MapReduce. Oh, MapReduce is a very well known algorithm and big data realm. And now itâ€™s been, of course, transformed significantly, since its original inception, inception, to handle even larger amounts of information.
